title: Person In Steamy Room Medium Dark Skin Tone
description: Depicts a person in a steamy room, commonly associated with saunas, spas, or steam rooms. It conveys relaxation, wellness, or a heated environment. The medium-dark skin tone specifies the emoji's appearance.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person in a steamy room emoji features a medium-dark skinned figure enveloped in a cloud of soft, translucent steam. Apple‚Äôs signature 3D shading creates a sense of depth, making the steam appear ethereal and the figure subtly outlined, evoking a feeling of relaxation and rejuvenation. This emoji is perfect for communicating a sense of calm, peace, or a luxurious spa experience, as rendered with Apple's characteristic attention to detail.
